summary: The story of Shell, a girl who lives with her father Pete in a remote gas station in the Scottish Highlands, in their struggle against the elements and the impossible love they feel during the last winter that she will be in that place.
cast: Chloe Pirrie|Michael Smiley|Joseph Mawle|Iain De Caestecker|Paul Thomas Hickey|Kate Dickie|Morven Christie|Milla Gibson|Tam Dean Burn
keywords: father daughter incest overtones|suicide of father|attempted incest|committing suicide|loneliness
title: Shell
